long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Our joliscreen Chrome extension elevates your browsing experience with a stunning gallery of artistic masterpieces. Discover a captivating collection of curated artworks by renowned artists, right on your browser's new tab page. From iconic classics to contemporary wonders, each new tab unveils a visual masterpiece that sets the stage for your browsing experience. Ignite your creativity, broaden your horizons, and transform your screen into an ever-changing gallery of awe-inspiring beauty.

If you find an image that captivates you, simply click the link to purchase a breathtaking physical print. Powered by GiantArt.com.
long.fr:
Change your new tabs background to beautiful art pieces.

If the displayed art is to your tastes, a link is available to buy a physical print.
